entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as being part of the team and having Quidditch practice.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The coach of the team, mentioned as working the team harder than ever and giving them bad news.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: A house in the school, mentioned as being the opponent in the next match.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house in the school, mentioned as being overtaken by Gryffindor if they win their next match.

relationships.description: Harry is on Wood's side, as mentioned in the text: 'The Weasleys complained that Wood was becoming a fanatic, but Harry was on Woodâ€™s side.'
Harry's team is playing against Hufflepuff in their next match, as mentioned in the text: 'If they won their next match, against Hufflepuff...'
Harry's team is trying to overtake Slytherin in the House Championship, as mentioned in the text: 'If they won their next match, against Hufflepuff, they would overtake Slytherin...'
Wood is the coach of Harry's team, as mentioned in the text: 'Wood was working the team harder than ever.'
